sense.def:
Z besedo
doubly
povemo, da ima nekaj dva vidika ali lastnosti.

seg.quote: He is doubly disadvantaged, both by his age and by his nationality.

sense.def:
Z besedo
doubly
tudi povemo, da se nekaj zgodi ali velja v večji meri kot navadno.

cit.quote: dvojno, dvakrat toliko, še enkrat toliko

seg.quote: It was doubly difficult for Dora at her age.
